plot: A wealthy Sonia marries uneducated Sahil and takes him to Landon. Sahil here will be asked to take up prostitution to maintain her lifestyle, He befriends Negar a stripper and both plan escape from his evil wife Sonia
title: Double Cross: Ek Dhoka
plot_es: A wealthy Sonia marries uneducated Sahil and takes him to Landon. Sahil here will be asked to take up prostitution to maintain her lifestyle, He befriends Negar a stripper and both plan escape from his evil wife Sonia
plot_en: A wealthy Sonia marries uneducated Sahil and takes him to Landon. Sahil here will be asked to take up prostitution to maintain her lifestyle, He befriends Negar a stripper and both plan escape from his evil wife Sonia
